scripts.compile:coffeescript: browserify --extension=".coffee"  -t [ coffeeify --bare false --header false ] -o target/bundle.js src/index.coffee
scripts.compile:coffeescript:release: npm run compile:coffeescript -- -t [ envify --NODE_ENV production ] && uglifyjs --compress -o target/bundle.js -- target/bundle.js
scripts.compile:web:development: pug -P --out target/web/ src/web/ & npm run compile:coffeescript:development
scripts.compile:web:release: pug --out target/web/ src/web/ & npm run compile:coffeescript:release
scripts.compile-and-benchmark: npm run compile:rust:asmjs:release; npm run compile:rust:wasm:release; npm run bench
scripts.clean:
git clean -xdfn; read -n1 -r -p "
press ctrl+c to stop" key; git clean -xdf; printf "
done!
"
